scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Kathryn
scrape.text: This was recommended to me by one of my favorite librarians. Recommended in the sense SHE absolutely loved it. I'd heard of the book, although knew nothing about the story. There is not one character in the story that I liked. They were all a little warped. I do not understand parents that hide, ignore, or do whatever it takes to cover up things there children are guilty of and in this story what occurred was BIG. I do like books that are not all sweet and happily ever after, but these characters frightened me, nothing was beyond their capabilities.
